name: Nyctophobia (itch) (OMG_STOP_GONNA_SCREAM)
description:
A top-down 2D survival horror game where your primary objective is to escape. Many evils lurk in the shadows, some even out for your blood...

Tell me... are you afraid of the dark?

controls: WASD for movement, F for flashlight, I for inventory, spacebar to use items
